go_data.justification: IFNgamma treated haploid HAP1 cells express high levels of cell surface PD-L1.

go_data.term: regulation of protein localization to cell surface
go_data.justification: IFNgamma exposure induces PD-L1 expression on the cell surface.
IFNgamma is described as a cytokine that induces PD-L1 expression.
IFNgamma is involved in the regulation of PD-L1, which plays a role in immune response.
